net.tridentsdk.api

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.api.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impalable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TridentBlock

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements Impalable
    A basic structure in minecraft, a material bearing piece set at a given location

      • projectiles

        public java.util.List<Projectile> projectiles()
        Description copied from interface: Impalable
        Gets the projectiles that impaled the object

        The list is ordered by first is oldest available arrow, and the last projectile is the newest projectile impaling the tile/entity.

        Returns null if the current impalable was never hit by a projectile, or impaledEntity == null && impaledTile == null

        This is a immutable collection

        Specified by:
        projectiles in interface Impalable
        Returns:
        the last projectile that impaled the object
